Packing my suitcase to... I'm so happy to announce that I'm invited to #TravelwithTJD episode 9 to Japan! A country I've dreamed of going! Filled with culture, food and incredible people! #TravelwithTJD is a concept where @traveljunkiediary invites followers from across the world to travel with her on an experiential trip, building a lifetime of memories and making new friends! We are flying with @emirates and staying at @ritzcarlton in Tokyo and in Kyoto!! I'm also so excited  to meet the new guests on this trip!! #Emiratesairlines #RCMemories #Hellotomorrow
